name: Kachchi Biriany
description: A traditional Bangladeshi Kachchi Biriany. It's really tough to get good Kachchi Biryani in Dhaka city. It makes mouth water just to think about it.

name: Beef Tehari
description: A delicious Bangladeshi rice dish cooked with aromatic spices and tender beef, known for its unique flavor and texture.

name: Panta Ilish
description: A traditional Bangladeshi dish consisting of fermented rice and Hilsa fish, usually served with various accompaniments.

name: Bhuna Khichuri
description: A flavorful and spicy Bengali rice dish made with a mix of lentils, vegetables, and aromatic spices, known for its comforting taste.

name: Dumplings
description: Steamed dumplings with a savory pork and vegetable filling.

name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: A classic Sichuan dish with diced chicken, peanuts, and vegetables in a spicy sauce.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy fried spring rolls filled with vegetables and sometimes meat.

name: Mapo Tofu
description: A popular Sichuan dish made with tofu, minced meat, and a spicy sauce.

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, meat, and cheese baked to perfection.

name: Pizza Margherita
description: Classic Neapolitan pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Risotto alla Milanese
description: Creamy saffron-infused rice dish from Milan.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assorted sushi rolls with fresh fish and vegetables

name: Ramen Bowl
description: Traditional Japanese noodle soup with soy sauce base and various toppings

name: Tempura Platter
description: Lightly battered and deep-fried seafood and vegetables

name: Miso Soup
description: Traditional Japanese soup made with dashi stock and miso paste, with tofu and seaweed

name: Taco
description: A traditional Mexican dish consisting of a corn or wheat tortilla folded or rolled around a filling.

name: Burrito
description: A type of Mexican and Tex-Mex food, consisting of a wheat flour tortilla wrapped or folded into a cylindrical shape to completely enclose the filling.

name: Guacamole
description: A popular Mexican avocado-based dip, spread, or salad first developed by the Aztecs.

name: Enchiladas
description: A popular Mexican dish, made with tortillas rolled around a filling and covered with a chili pepper sauce.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: Spicy and sour soup with herbs and seafood

name: Green Curry
description: Spicy coconut milk curry with meat and vegetables

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with eggs, tofu, and shrimp

name: Mango Sticky Rice
description: Sweet glutinous rice topped with fresh mango slices
